Producer: Jamie Patricof, Lynette Howell Taylor, Alex Orlovsky, Sidney Kimmel
Screenwriter: Ben Coccio, Darius Marder, Derek Cianfrance
Production Co: Sidney Kimmel Entertainment, Electric City Entertainment
Rating: R (Language Throughout|A Sexual Reference|Some Violence|Teen Drug and Alcohol Use)
Synopsis: In upstate New York, two men (Ryan Gosling, Bradley Cooper), and later, their sons (Dane DeHaan, Emory Cohen) must deal with the unforeseen consequences of their actions.
Title: The Place Beyond the Pines
